QuestData.Title: Dousing the Flames
QuestData.Description: The Horde have set fire to my town, $c. I will make them pay for this.$b$bStormsong Valley is the breadbasket of Kul Tiras, and our people need to be fed. The first thing we must do is damage control.$b$bGrab some buckets and help put those fires out!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Water Bucket to put out $1oa fires around the Ruins of Brennadam.
QuestData.RewardText: Bombs, fire, Horde. Our town will endure it all.
